basics.name: Shisen Yue
basics.label: Undergraduate Student, Shanghai Jiao Tong University
basics.summary-para1: Hi, I am Shisen Yue and I'm studying for a B.A. in Linguistics in the Department of Foreign Language at Shanghai Jiao Tong University on track to graduate in 2024. I'm interested in Computational Linguistics and Natural Language Processing. During my undergraduate study, I'm honored to be supervised by Professor Hai Hu under the Department of Foreign Language in SJTU on the research of large language models.
basics.summary-para2: Started from Spring 2023, I'm lucky to be a research assistant supervised by Professor William Schuler at Ohio State University, working on computational models of human language processing.
basics.summary-para3: I'm applying for Linguistics phd programs this fall, Welcome to read my CV and my research statement : )
